executive_summary.key_insight: TechFlow Solutions has strong customer service foundations but is leaving €180K+ on the table annually through manual processes. The 'quick wins' in support automation and lead scoring can pay for your entire AI investment in 6 months.

not_recommended.title: Full CRM Replacement
not_recommended.reason: Your current CRM works well; integrate AI on top rather than replacing

not_recommended.title: Custom Chatbot Development
not_recommended.reason: Off-the-shelf solutions like Intercom AI are more cost-effective at your scale

verdict.headline: Strong Opportunity
verdict.subheadline: Your business is well-positioned for AI adoption
reasoning: Clear ROI opportunity with 6-month payback potential
Existing data infrastructure supports AI implementation
Team shows willingness to adopt new tools
recommended_approach: Start with customer support triage (highest ROI, lowest risk)
Evaluate invoice automation after Q1 results

findings.title: Customer Support Team Overwhelmed
findings.description: Support team spends 60% of time on repetitive tier-1 questions that could be automated. Response times averaging 4 hours are hurting customer satisfaction.

findings.title: Sales Team Lacks Lead Prioritization
findings.description: Sales reps treat all leads equally, spending same time on low-probability leads as high-value ones. Win rate is 12% when industry average is 20%.

findings.title: Manual Invoice Processing
findings.description: Finance team manually processes 200+ invoices monthly, with 3% error rate causing payment delays and vendor frustration.

recommendations.title: Deploy AI Support Triage System
recommendations.description: Implement AI-powered ticket routing and auto-response for common queries. Reduces tier-1 volume by 40-60%.

why_it_matters.customer_value: Customers get instant answers 24/7, improving satisfaction scores
why_it_matters.business_health: Frees support team for complex issues, reduces burnout and turnover

risk.description: AI may misroute complex tickets initially
risk.mitigation: Keep human review for first 30 days

custom_solution.approach: Build custom RAG chatbot on your knowledge base

recommendations.recommendation_rationale: Intercom Fin provides 80% of the value at 20% of the cost of custom development. At your ticket volume, the ROI math strongly favors the off-the-shelf approach.

recommendations.title: Implement Predictive Lead Scoring
recommendations.description: Use ML to score and prioritize leads based on fit, behavior, and intent signals. Focus sales effort on highest-probability opportunities.

why_it_matters.customer_value: Better-qualified prospects get more attention, improving their buying experience
why_it_matters.business_health: Higher win rates and shorter sales cycles directly impact revenue

risk.description: Model needs 3-6 months of data to train properly
risk.mitigation: Start with rule-based scoring, then layer ML

custom_solution.approach: Build custom scoring model using your CRM data + external signals

recommendations.recommendation_rationale: HubSpot's built-in scoring gets you 70% of the benefit immediately. As you grow, you can evaluate 6sense for intent data.

short_term.title: Deploy AI Support Triage
short_term.description: Set up Intercom Fin AI with your knowledge base

short_term.title: Implement Lead Scoring
short_term.description: Enable HubSpot predictive scoring on existing leads
short_term.expected_outcome: Sales focuses on top 30% of leads

mid_term.title: Invoice Automation
mid_term.description: Deploy OCR + workflow automation for AP

long_term.title: Customer Health Scoring
long_term.description: Predict churn risk and expansion opportunities

tasks.title: Create Intercom account and connect to your platform
Configure Fin AI settings and brand voice
Run internal test with 20 sample queries

adoption_stats.metric: Time to value for AI tools

social_proof.result: Reduced support costs 45% with AI triage
Doubled sales efficiency with lead scoring

limitations: Revenue projections are estimates based on industry averages
